pma:database.name: db_name
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `progress` ( `sneakerID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` int(11) NOT NULL, `transfer_sk_to_hk` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `arrived` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `listing_item` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `sold_item` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `shipped_to_buyer` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `payout_on_sk` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `submit_sell_info` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sneakerID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=403 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
